'''Only the Night Breeze Can Be Heard''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat 4 opponents using [[Nightsoul]]-aligned attacks within 5s.

==Gameplay Notes==
* This achievement does not need to be completed in Natlan. The player can go to a low level domain in any nation if overworld enemies are too difficult to defeat quickly.
